attributes.action: Support J Downey’s #NationalTimeOut & save bars/restaurants/ cafes closure.
attributes.additional_details: Our hospitality industry will be decimated by covid 19.  Britain has always prided its cultural contribution to the world with music and the arts. We will see a whole generation of businesses and jobs, particularly for young people, lost forever.
attributes.background: Rolled out nationally.The next 9 months' rent is pushed back so restaurants pay nothing until 1st quarter of 2021. Leases extended by 9 months so payments aren't lost, just postponed. Landlords helped with same push back on 9 months of loan repayments. And other protections in the proposal.

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for rent is a matter for individual landlords, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Encourage lenders, landlords and utilities to freeze payments during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

Economic assistance for the hospitality industry during the COVID-19 pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302162
